The '''Parasite Clone''' technique is one utilised by [[Akatsuki]]'s [[White Zetsu]].

== Usage ==
This technique allows White Zetsu to biologically produce clones of himself, of which he is able to communicate and control remotely.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 505, page 11</ref> Being his perfect duplicates, they resemble him closely, aside from pants, sandals, and his flytrap like appendage. Unlike normal clones, they don't dispel when they are dealt damage or killed.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 487, pages 15-16</ref> Even if the original user is killed, they will not dispel.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 618, page 12</ref> They can also be used with White Zetsu's [[Substitute Technique]] to assume the form of any individual that he has touched, even copying their unique [[chakra]] and items.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 487, page 14</ref>
